page.title: 02Introduction (2)
page.content: The population numbers approximately six hundred people and is mainly concentrated around North and Middle Littleton. There is a mixture of old and new housing, a wide variety ranging from terraced cottages to larger farm houses. Approximately forty new houses have been built in the last twenty years. Cottages which were several hundred years old and allowed to fall into disrepair have been modernised and extended. In the main these properties have been purchased by people moving into the area who work in the nearby towns.
